name: Night of Exile
description:
Night of Exile

Night of Exile is a Top-down Roguelike game set in 17th Century Europe, where you play as an Exiled Plague Doctor who was accused of spreading a deadly plague unto the town. Now you have to fend for yourself against the Creatures of the Dark. Luckily the Goddess in the Statue has decided to aid you in your survival by providing you with various buffs to defeat the Creatures of the Night.

This game was created for our Game Programming 3 finals.
